long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PicTranslate is a powerful tool that empowers users to easily translate texts present in images directly on their device's screen, while also offering the additional functionality of editing the final translation result.

With this extension, you no longer need to manually type the text you want to translate. Simply right-click on any image on the screen and select the translate option, and PicTranslate will automatically recognize the textual elements present in the image. The optical character recognition (OCR) technology ensures exceptional accuracy in text identification.

After the automatic translation of the recognized text, you have the freedom to adjust and enhance the final result. The intuitive interface of PicTranslate allows you to edit the translated text directly on the PicTranslate website. You can correct errors, adjust grammar, improve word choice, and personalize the translation as needed. The system automatically saves the changes made, facilitating access to previous versions if necessary.

PicTranslate is highly versatile and works across various applications and websites, allowing you to translate text in images in any online context. Whether it's translating text in images from websites, documents, articles, messages, social media posts, or any other form of visual content with text, the extension offers a streamlined and efficient process.

Key Features:

1. On-screen image translation: Use screen images to quickly translate text directly in PicTranslate.
2. Optical character recognition (OCR): Accurate and reliable identification of text in images.
3. Automatic translation: Receive an initial automatic translation of the recognized text.
4. Customized editing: Make adjustments, corrections, and improvements to the translated text.
5. Automatic saving: Changes made in the translation are automatically saved.
6. Universal compatibility: Works across various applications and online sites.

Enjoy the convenience of translating on-screen images and the freedom to edit the final translation result with the PicTranslate extension. Simplify your translation experience and make it more precise and personalized than ever before. Try it now and discover a new level of efficiency in image translation.
